original_text: It was to show his righteousness at the present time, so that he might be just and the justifier of the one who has faith in Jesus.
korean_text: 곧 이 때에 자기의 의로우심을 나타내사 자기도 의로우시며 또한 예수 믿는 자를 의롭다 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: It was to show his righteousness at the present time,
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 현재 그의 의를 나타내기 위함이며,
